entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -16.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 12:41 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -16.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 50 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -24.2°C
Wind: NW 55 km/h gust 77 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 12:26 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:26 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:26 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
